articles.author: Amy Sarkar
articles.title: Huawei MatePad 10.4 2022 grabs September 2022 security patch - HC Newsroom
articles.description: It’s a tablet day, as Huawei is sending new software update of the MatePad 10.4 2022 version and it aims to install September 2022 security patch for the device. According to the tipster, this update is rolling out in Europe and it’ll continue expand among us…
articles.content: Huawei is rolling out a new HarmonyOS 3 upgrade that brings a fresh set of security features. Apart from the latest additions, the new changes also enhance the privacy aspects. HarmonyOS 3 mobile ope… [+2930 chars]

articles.author: Lloyd Burnard
articles.title: Elton Jantjies sidelined from Springbok tour, team dietician Simjee returns - News24
articles.description: Elton Jantjies will not be part of the Springbok squad that will travel to Europe for four Tests in November, casting further doubts over his international future.
articles.content:
• Elton Jantjies will not be selected for the Springboks' year-end tour to Europe. 
  • Director of rugby Rassie Erasmus says it was difficult to pick Jantjies given his lack of game time. … [+3718 chars]

articles.author: Lloyd Burnard
articles.title: Pollard likely to miss Springbok tour as flyhalf debate rages on - News24
articles.description: Springbok flyhalf Handre Pollard is unlikely to feature in his side's end-of-year tour to Europe next month, where Tests against Ireland, Italy, France and England await.
articles.content:
